entry.title: Special Weather Statement issued April 06 at 7:35PM CDT by NWS
entry.summary: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Marengo, central Perry, south central Hale and northern Dallas Counties through 830 PM CDT... At 734 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Faunsdale, or 7 miles northwest of Uniontown, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and nickel size hail.

entry.title: Special Weather Statement issued April 06 at 7:13PM CDT by NWS
entry.summary: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northern Choctaw County through 800 PM CDT... At 712 PM CDT, National Weather Service doppler radar indicated a strong thunderstorm near Kinterbish, or 7 miles south of Cuba, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail.

entry.title: Winter Storm Warning issued April 06 at 1:48PM MDT until April 07 at 12:00AM MDT by NWS
entry.summary: .Upslope snow will continue into this evening across the northern Black Hills, then decrease overnight. Additional snow accumulations of 1 to 3 inches are expected, with the highest totals at higher elevations. The snow combined with wind gusts over 50 mph will lead to blowing and drifting snow, especially in open areas, and could result in significant travel impacts.
